scripts.generate: docker run --rm --volume $PWD:/app -w /app --name laravelComposer composer composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel laravel
scripts.bash:install: docker exec -ti laravelArtisanServe apk add --no-cache bash
scripts.serve:basic: docker run --rm -p '8000:8000' --volume $PWD:/app --name laravelArtisanServe -w /app/laravel php:7-cli-alpine php artisan serve --host 0.0.0.0
